<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is used to upload benefit payment schedule to the system

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"benefitPayments":{"description":"An array of benefit payment objects, each containing the following fields","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"accountNumber":{"description":"The account number related to the payment","type":"string","example":"2008805086"},"amount":{"description":"The amount being paid to the beneficiary","type":"string","example":"944,671.12"},"bankName":{"description":"The name of the bank handling the transaction","type":"string","example":"FIRST BANK"},"beneficiaryAcctNumber":{"description":"The account number of the beneficiary","type":"string","example":"2008805085"},"beneficiaryName":{"description":"The name of the beneficiary receiving the payment","type":"string","example":"NWAORGU ALEXANDER CHIMAMKPA"},"corporateName":{"description":"The name of the corporate entity associated with the payment","type":"string","example":"FPCNL RE OAK RSA FUND II INVESTMENT A/C"},"naration":{"description":"A narration or additional information about the payment","type":"string","example":"LOSS OF JOB PAYMENT"},"numberOfItems":{"description":"The number of items included in the benefit payment","type":"string","example":"4"},"pIN_Number":{"description":"The PIN number associated with the transaction","type":"string","example":"PEN100878993523"},"pencom_REf":{"description":"The reference number for PenCom","type":"string","example":"PENCOM/TECH/BI/2023/DT939"},"rSAPin":{"description":"The RSAPIN for authentication","type":"string","example":"Radix Pensions7992"},"serialNum":{"description":"The serial number of the transaction","type":"string","example":"1"},"sortCode":{"description":"The sort code of the bank","type":"string","example":"11150000"},"totalValue":{"description":"The total value of the benefit payment","type":"string","example":"3,252,878.34"},"transactionDescription":{"description":"A description of the transaction","type":"string","example":"LOSS OF JOB PAYMENT"},"transactionType":{"description":"The type of transaction (e.g., Credit or Debit)","type":"string","enum":["Credit","Debit"],"example":"Credit"}}},"example":[{"accountNumber":"2008805086","amount":"944,671.12","bankName":"FIRST BANK","beneficiaryAcctNumber":"2008805085","beneficiaryName":"NWAORGU ALEXANDER CHIMAMKPA","corporateName":"FPCNL RE OAK RSA FUND II INVESTMENT A/C","naration":"LOSS OF JOB PAYMENT","numberOfItems":"4","pIN_Number":"PEN100878993523","pencom_REf":"PENCOM/TECH/BI/2023/DT939","rSAPin":"Radix Pensions7992","serialNum":1,"sortCode":11150000,"totalValue":"3,252,878.34","transactionDescription":"LOSS OF JOB PAYMENT","transactionType":"Credit"}]},"scheduleCode":{"description":"The code representing the schedule","type":"string","example":"BP-011"}}},"examples":{"Upload Benefit Payment Schedule":{"value":{"benefitPayments":[{"accountNumber":"2008805086","amount":"944,671.12","bankName":"FIRST BANK","beneficiaryAcctNumber":"\"2008805085\"","beneficiaryName":"NWAORGU ALEXANDER CHIMAMKPA","corporateName":"FPCNL RE OAK RSA FUND II INVESTMENT A/C","naration":"LOSS OF JOB PAYMENT","numberOfItems":"4","pIN_Number":"PEN100878993523","pencom_REf":"PENCOM/TECH/BI/2023/DT939","rSAPin":"Radix Pensions7992","serialNum":"1","sortCode":"11150000","totalValue":"3,252,878.34","transactionDescription":"LOSS OF JOB PAYMENT","transactionType":"Credit"}],"scheduleCode":"BP-011"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
